entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening. Rain mixed with snow before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
